      • drainBottleToHandler

        public static boolean drainBottleToHandler(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack,
                                           net.minecraftforge.fluids.capability.IFluidHandler handler,
                                           net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player,
                                           net.minecraft.util.Hand hand)
        Attempts to drain the item to an IFluidHandler. These are special-cased.
        Parameters:
        stack - The stack (bottle) to drain from.
        handler - The IFluidHandler to fill.
        player - The player using the item.
        hand - The hand the player is holding the item in.
        Returns:
        If the interaction was successful.

      • fillBottleFromHandler

        public static boolean fillBottleFromHandler(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack,
                                            net.minecraftforge.fluids.capability.IFluidHandler handler,
                                            net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player,
                                            net.minecraft.util.Hand hand)
        Attempts to fill the item from an IFluidHandler.
        Parameters:
        stack - The stack to fill.
        handler - The IFluidHandler to drain from.
        player - The player using the item.
        hand - The hand the player is holding the item in.
        Returns:
        If the interaction was successful.

      • drainItemToHandler

        public static boolean drainItemToHandler(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack,
                                         net.minecraftforge.fluids.capability.IFluidHandler handler,
                                         net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player,
                                         net.minecraft.util.Hand hand)
        Attempts to drain the item to an IFluidHandler.
        Parameters:
        stack - The stack to drain from.
        handler - The IFluidHandler to fill.
        player - The player using the item.
        hand - The hand the player is holding the item in.
        Returns:
        If the interaction was successful.

      • fillItemFromHandler

        public static boolean fillItemFromHandler(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack,
                                          net.minecraftforge.fluids.capability.IFluidHandler handler,
                                          net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player,
                                          net.minecraft.util.Hand hand)
        Attempts to fill the item from an IFluidHandler.
        Parameters:
        stack - The stack to fill.
        handler - The IFluidHandler to drain from.
        player - The player using the item.
        hand - The hand the player is holding the item in.
        Returns:
        If the interaction was successful.

      • interactWithHandler

        public static boolean interactWithHandler(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack,
                                          net.minecraftforge.fluids.capability.IFluidHandler handler,
                                          net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player,
                                          net.minecraft.util.Hand hand)
        Attempts to interact the item with an IFluidHandler. Interaction will always try and drain the item first, if this fails it will attempt to fill the item.
        Parameters:
        stack - The stack to interact with.
        handler - The Handler to fill / drain.
        player - The player using the item.
        hand - The hand the player is holding the item in.
        Returns:
        If any interaction with the handler was successful.
